i have both tried to log onto the ea with my already existing account, and a new one, used both serial-keys : XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX   and 11111-11111-11111-11111-11111. and none works.

so my conclusion is that i must create some kind of offline account for this game/not logging in at all (which btw doesnt work, the game just closes itself) however i do not understand how to make that offline piece and i would like if you could explain it to us/me.

thanks up front, and have a great evening!

YES! i got it to work!

guys, if someone is stuck on the keygen whe u are supposed to login, forget it! select create new and then when the microsoft contract comes, there is a phrase that is marked in BLUE which says 'create local account' or something like that, that is the solution, u dont have to confirm the keygen or anything! 

thanks for me i know im the best there is! Happy Gaming Gamers!
